backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with user profiles, workouts, recovery tracking, exercise library, and stable storage types.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature-evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Documentation-only file used to force a rebuild after a failed deployment.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the PWA including meta tags, manifest links, splash screens, and root mounting element.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme settings, and display configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling authentication flow, page navigation, splash screen, and workout validation.
Modal component for updating and validating user bodyweight with profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with page switching, vibration feedback, and integrated settings modal.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Modal to display and select alternative exercises, record the selection, and notify the parent component.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app branding, test mode badge, settings button, and logout handler.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Implements a custom pull-to-refresh interaction using touch events and animated UI feedback.
Displays muscle recovery data with badges, colors, optional weighted leg averaging, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: User settings modal allowing editing and saving profile fields such as gender, weight, dark mode, and rest intervals.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full-screen splash screen with animated logo and tagline.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Displays daily streak count and current date in a sticky status bar.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: Modal to share workouts via link, QR code generation, clipboard copying, or native share API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks wrapping backend operations with error handling, workout validation, and user profile defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Implements a wakeâ€‘lock hook that acquires, maintains, and re-acquires screen wake locks with robust error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based dark theme styles with mobile optimizations, safe-area support, and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides helpers to save, load, clear, and detect active workout sessions in sessionStorage with expiration logic.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Utility functions to convert, validate, and format backend nanosecond timestamps into usable dates and strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user workout history, recovery data, and actions with refresh, navigation, and timestamp handling logic.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows past workouts with timestamp formatting, calendar highlights, and a refresh option.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides the Internet Identity login interface with branding and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: Generates full, upper, or lower body workouts via hooks and lets users start a new session.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects and saves initial user profile data including weight, gender, and training preferences.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays muscle recovery and weekly volume using query hooks, with refresh handling and UI cards for each muscle group.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Renders a workout preview with validation, regeneration, and exercise replacement flows before starting a session.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Runs the active workout session, tracking sets, timers, logs, PRs, and exercise changes with persistent session handling.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for exercises, workouts, recovery, volume, and related frontend-only data structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and required backend/frontend fixes for workout generation and rendering. Highlights logic errors in lower-body workout creation and recovery-threshold problems causing missing leg exercises.
